name: electric connector production, peripheral component interconnect buss | electric connector, peripheral component interconnect buss | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/828/documentation

This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of internal connectors for computer technology, i.e. the so-called Peripheral Component Interconnect (PCI) bus. It is based on the assumption that a typical 64-bit PCI bus connector has an average weight of 11.6 g. The data represent a current PCI bus type connector like used in current information and communication technology (i.e. computers). Material data are taken from datasheets of producers of such capacitors and from the literature. Infrastructure and production efforts are based on own assumptions and taken from the Swedish LCI database and have thus, accordingly higher uncertainty.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

From reception of metals and plastics at the factory gate.

This dataset includes raw material input and production efforts for the production of PCI bus type connectors.
category: C:Manufacturing/26:Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products/261:Manufacture of electronic components and boards/2610:Manufacture of electronic components and boards

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data represent a global valuable composition of a 64-bit PCI slot connector.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: average connector production technology, based on literature and assumptions

exchanges.description:
64-bit PCI slot, used for the connection of specific boards (e.g. graphic adapter, sound card) to the main board of a computer. Main data source are own calculations based on the product description schemes of such a 64-bit PCI slot - taken as an average connector of this type here. The data represent thereby the global situation for PCI connections.
EcoSpold01Location=GLO
